name: AddAllFromSourceListToDestinationList
description:
Add records from a source list to a destination list in HubSpot.

This tool transfers all records from a specified source list to a destination list in HubSpot CRM, ignoring duplicates. Suitable for destination lists with manual or snapshot processing and source lists with fewer than 100,000 memberships.

parameters.name: destination_list_id
parameters.description: The ILS ID of the MANUAL or SNAPSHOT destination list to which the source list records are added.

value_schema.description: The **ILS ID** of the `MANUAL` or `SNAPSHOT` *destination list*, which the *source list* records are added to.

parameters.name: source_list_id
parameters.description: The ILS ID of the source list from which records are added to the destination list.

value_schema.description: The **ILS ID** of the *source list* to grab the records from, which are then added to the *destination list*.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the hubspot_crm API.

parameters.name: listId
parameters.description: The **ILS ID** of the `MANUAL` or `SNAPSHOT` *destination list*, which the *source list* records are added to.

value_schema.description: The **ILS ID** of the `MANUAL` or `SNAPSHOT` *destination list*, which the *source list* records are added to.

parameters.name: sourceListId
parameters.description: The **ILS ID** of the *source list* to grab the records from, which are then added to the *destination list*.

value_schema.description: The **ILS ID** of the *source list* to grab the records from, which are then added to the *destination list*.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
